introduction: SYNOPSISJung-wu's wife Hye-mi and his mistress Jin-hi are unfortunately both being treated at mental hospitals. Hye-mi was attacked by three perverts while camping out on their honeymoon. Jin-hi was severely abused by a middle-aged sculptor who is sexually handicapped. Due to these incidents, Jin-hi has desires for releasing her natural energy and Hye-mi wants to be treated through sex with her husband. Afterwards, Jung-wu and Hye-mi ride in a sleeping car of a train as a part of her sex treatment. But Hye-mi throws herself out of train and in the end, Jung-wu and Jin-hi start seeing each other again.故事Jung-woo的妻子Hae-mi和Jung-woo的情人Jin-hee都在精神病院里接受治疗。在蜜月期间，他在营地受到三名男子的袭击，金希被一位中年雕塑家严重虐待，一名性功能障碍者。金熙渴望释放本能，海美通过性活动呼吁丈夫治疗。克里斯和Hyemi使用卧铺作为治疗的方法，同时在火车旅行Hyemi抛体而出的列车端部后克里斯和珍妮再次见面。
